defaultCharacters.description: A brash yet skilled melee brawler.
A warlock adept with communing with the infernal.

classes.description: A savage berserker focusing their rage into offensive strikes and constitution bolstering manuevers.
Charismatic to a point, bards use their silvertongues and musical aptitude to control the battlefield and help their allies.
A devout follower of their faith that harnesses their dieties energies to help their allies or dispatch their foes.
A gifted shapeshifter and practitioner of nature magic. Well rounded and diverse druids can fill just about any party role.
A master of combat their uses their martial prowess to bolster themselves agaisnt damage or focus their might into tactical strikes.
Skilled in the martial arts and the use of their Ki. Allowing for multiple stikes and evasive manuevers.
A warrior of the faith. Take your Oath and use the magical power to aid yourself on your crusade.
A skilled marksman with extensive knowledge of the wilds. Aid your party at range with a flurry of arrows or an animal companion.
A master of stealth that prefers trickery and flanking to head-to-head comabat. Master of sleight of hand and theivery.
A sorcerer is attuned to magic through their bloodline. Allowing for a natural aptitude to bend magic to their will.
A warlock derives their powers their pacts made with Eldritch beings. Masters of control through manipulation and blasts of energy.
A wizard is attuned to magic through rigorous study. A master of their craft they learn can cast spells of great magnitude. Highly verstile magic.

races.description: Proud race of humanoids born from the blood of an ancient dragon god.
Bold and brash, these people are known for their mining and stonework along with outstanding courage.
Elegant and regal, the Elves are a potent magical race that enjoys the higher things in life.
A small but fierce race of highly energetic peoples. Highly adept in tinkering and other knowledgable affairs.
Born of a human and an elf the high elves combine the hardiness of humans with the arcane aptitude of the elves.
races.statBonus: Gives +2 Charisma and +1 in two other Stats!

races.description: A race of timid yet festive folk that are rarely seen on the battlefield. They try to avoid the ire of others.
Born of a human and an orc these folk have an imposing figure with their orcish heritage showing clear.
Humans are highly adabptable and ready for any situation. Inventive and ambitious humans can be found all over.
Born of a human bloodline, but purple/blue skin and horns making their infernal heritage readily apparent.
